alert.note: Alert for Northern Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Valley County through 600 PM MDT... At 459 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 21 miles north of Hinsdale, or 26 miles southwest of Opheim, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Opheim, Glentana and Baylor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for northeastern Montana.
